computeMarginal

public Object computeMarginal(double[][] inputMessages)
Description copied from interface: FactorPotential
Compute the marginal given the input variable converged messages. The return type is an Object b/c depending on the arity of the FactorPotential you get a double[], double[][], double[][][], etc...
